name: colemakcamp
description: A fork of Colemak Club that overhauls the entire experience. Brings support for custom themes and a wider range of display sizes.

scripts.minify:css: cleancss -o styles/cascadiacode.min.css styles/cascadiacode.css && cleancss -o styles/fontasm.min.css styles/fontasm.css && cleancss -o styles/radiocanada.min.css styles/radiocanada.css && cleancss -o styles/main.min.css styles/main.css
scripts.minify:js: terser scripts/app.js -o scripts/app.min.js -c -m && terser scripts/camp-calls.js -o scripts/camp-calls.min.js -c -m && terser scripts/fake-input.js -o scripts/fake-input.min.js -c -m && terser scripts/keyboard-divs.js -o scripts/keyboard-divs.min.js -c -m && terser scripts/layout-info.js -o scripts/layout-info.min.js -c -m && terser scripts/libconfig.js -o scripts/libconfig.min.js -c -m && terser scripts/new-key.js -o scripts/new-key.min.js -c -m && terser scripts/theme-stuff-re.js -o scripts/theme-stuff-re.min.js -c -m && terser scripts/word-list.js -o scripts/word-list.min.js -c -m && terser lib/popper.js -o lib/popper.min.js -c -m && terser lib/tippy.js -o lib/tippy.min.js -c -m
